F1129.title: F1129
F1129.description: Represents the F1129 form data as extracted from the XML.

id.description: Unique identifier for the F1129 form data.

versiunePdf.description: The PDF version of the F1129 form.

dRec.description: A numeric field from the F1129 form.

sumaControl.description: The control sum from the F1129 form.

totalOpm.description: Total number of OPM entries in the F1129 form.

nrInregistrari.description: Number of registrations in the F1129 form.

lunaR.description: The month of the report (luna_r) in the F1129 form.

an.description: The year of the F1129 form.

dataDocument.description: The date of the document in the F1129 form.

nrDocument.description: The document number in the F1129 form.

numeIp.description: Name of the IP (platitor) in the F1129 form.

adresaIp.description: Address of the IP (platitor) in the F1129 form.

cuiIp.description: CUI (fiscal identification code) of the IP (platitor) in the F1129 form.

tipEnt.description: Type of entity in the F1129 form.

codTrezPl.description: The treasury code of the payer in the F1129 form.

RandOp.title: RandOp
RandOp.description: Represents a row (rand_op) in the F1129 form, detailing a payment operation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment operation row (rand_op).

nrOp.description: The operation number (nr_op) in the payment operation.

ibanPlatitor.description: The IBAN of the payer (iban_platitor) in the payment operation.

denTrezorerie.description: The name of the treasury (den_trezorerie) in the payment operation.

cuiBeneficiar.description: The CUI (fiscal identification code) of the beneficiary (cui_beneficiar) in the payment operation.

denBeneficiar.description: The name of the beneficiary (den_beneficiar) in the payment operation.

ibanBeneficiar.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary (iban_beneficiar) in the payment operation.

denBancaTrez.description: The name of the treasury bank (den_banca_trez) in the payment operation.

sumaOp.description: The amount (suma_op) in the payment operation.

explicatii.description: Explanations related to the payment operation.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

createdAt.description: The date and time the user's account was created.

definition.description: Stores user profile data, including role and status.
